errors.name: InvalidPubkey
errors.msg: Pubkey cannot be the default pubkey

errors.name: InvalidNewAdmin
errors.msg: New admin cannot be the same as the current admin

errors.name: InvalidTransferAmount
errors.msg: Transfer amount must be greater than zero

errors.name: NoReceiptTokensMinted
errors.msg: No receipt tokens will be minted for deposit

errors.name: ProtocolNotOperational
errors.msg: Protocol is paused or in reduce-only status

errors.name: ProtocolNotWithdrawable
errors.msg: Protocol is not in a withdrawable status

errors.name: InvalidReceiptMint
errors.msg: Receipt mint address does not match

errors.name: InvalidStrategyType
errors.msg: Strategy type is invalid for this operation

errors.name: VaultNotOperational
errors.msg: Vault is paused or in reduce-only status

errors.name: VaultNotWithdrawable
errors.msg: Vault is not in a withdrawable status

errors.name: DepositCapReached
errors.msg: Deposit cap for the vault has been reached

errors.name: InsufficientVaultFundsToDeposit
errors.msg: Insufficient funds in the vault to deposit to strategy

errors.name: ZeroNetDeposits
errors.msg: Vault has zero net deposits, cannot mint or burn shares

errors.name: InvalidVaultDestinationTokenAccount
errors.msg: Vault destination token account does not match

errors.name: StrategyHasDepositsDeployed
errors.msg: Strategy cannot be closed until all desposits deployed are withdrawn

errors.name: InvalidLendingMarket
errors.msg: Lending market address does not match

errors.name: InvalidSourceMint
errors.msg: Source mint does not match strategy destination mint

fields.name: next_vault_id
docs: Vault ID, increments with each new vault

fields.name: platform_comission_fee_bps
docs: Fee taken on profits in basis points

fields.name: feed_id
docs: `FeedId` but avoid the type alias because of compatibility issues with Anchor's `idl-build` feature.

fields.name: publish_time
docs: The timestamp of this price update in seconds

fields.name: prev_publish_time
docs: The timestamp of the previous price update. This field is intended to allow users to
identify the single unique price update for any moment in time:
for any time t, the unique update is the one such that prev_publish_time < t <= publish_time.
Note that there may not be such an update while we are migrating to the new message-sending logic,
as some price updates on pythnet may not be sent to other chains (because the message-sending
logic may not have triggered). We can solve this problem by making the message-sending mandatory
(which we can do once publishers have migrated over).
Additionally, this field may be equal to publish_time if the message is sent on a slot where
where the aggregation was unsuccesful. This problem will go away once all publishers have
migrated over to a recent version of pyth-agent.

types.name: PriceUpdateV2
docs: A price update account. This account is used by the Pyth Receiver program to store a verified price update from a Pyth price feed.
It contains:
- `write_authority`: The write authority for this account. This authority can close this account to reclaim rent or update the account to contain a different price update.
- `verification_level`: The [`VerificationLevel`] of this price update. This represents how many Wormhole guardian signatures have been verified for this price update.
- `price_message`: The actual price update.
- `posted_slot`: The slot at which this price update was posted.

fields.name: deposits_deployed
docs: Total deposits deployed to the strategy

fields.name: deposit_mint
docs: Mint accepted as vault deposits

fields.name: price_update_v2
docs: Pyth PriceUpdateV2

fields.name: deposit_cap
docs: Max deposits accepted

fields.name: user_deposits
docs: Total user deposits, changes on user deposit/withdraw

fields.name: realized_pnl
docs: Total realized profit and loss across all strategies, accumulated on strategy execute/exit, excluding fees
Profit is only realized when exiting from strategies and deposits are withdrawn back to vault token accounts

fields.name: deposits_in_strategies
docs: Total deposits currently allocated in strategies, equals to sum of all Strategy deposits_deployed

fields.name: locked_profit
docs: Currently locked profit amount

fields.name: locked_profit_degradation_duration
docs: Duration over which locked profit degrades to zero in seconds

fields.name: last_profit_lock_ts
docs: Last timestamp when profit is recorded

fields.name: last_refresh_ts
docs: Last vault refresh timestamp

fields.name: unclaimed_manager_fee
docs: Claimable manager fees, accrues on profitable strategy exits

fields.name: manager_fee_bps
docs: Fee taken from positive user withdrawals in basis points

fields.name: next_strategy_id
docs: Strategy ID, increments with each new strategy

types.name: VerificationLevel
docs: Pyth price updates are bridged to all blockchains via Wormhole.
Using the price updates on another chain requires verifying the signatures of the Wormhole guardians.
The usual process is to check the signatures for two thirds of the total number of guardians, but this can be cumbersome on Solana because of the transaction size limits,
so we also allow for partial verification.
This enum represents how much a price update has been verified:
- If `Full`, we have verified the signatures for two thirds of the current guardians.
- If `Partial`, only `num_signatures` guardian signatures have been checked.
# Warning
Using partially verified price updates is dangerous, as it lowers the threshold of guardians that need to collude to produce a malicious price update.
